titleStmt.title: Mercurius Democritus, his last will and testament. With diverse legacies and wholsom admonitions, with other good cautions, left to all his friends and acquaintance, wheresoever dispersed, whether in England, Scotland, France, Ireland, Holland, Greenland , &c.
titleStmt.author: Crouch, John, fl. 1660-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the sign of the blind mans Bough in Thames-street, between London-bridge and Puddle-wharf,

notesStmt.note: Possibly by John Crouch, after the style of Mercurius Democritus and The laughing mercury. Cf. Thomason.

place.placeName: the sign of the blind mans Bough in Thames-street, between London-bridge
